product.name: NYX Mosaic Powder Blush Spice
product.description: NYX Mosaic Powder Blush is a medley of colors that creates a flush of color and dazzling glow for every skin tone. Features:Five shades in one palette, this blush is a brown-pinkWorks as blush and highlighterFlattering on every skin toneUse to highlight, enhance & brighten Each mosaic of color blends beautifully with magical results
